title: Binary Tree Traversal
description:
Given a binary tree, Write a method `preorder` to recursively traverse the tree in the preorder manner. Return array of elements visited in preorder format.

### Example

 ```
 1
 / \r
 2   3     ==> 1245367
 / \ / \
 4  5 6  7 
```

return.comment: Preordered array if binary tree elements
